Package org.jetel.data.formatter

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Formatter
    Interface to output data formatters
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractFormatter
    Basic abstract implementation of Formatter interface.
    BinaryDataFormatter
    This is a simple binary formatter which is used to store DataRecord objects into files DataRecords are stored in their serialised form Uses java.nio channels and DataRecord.
    ByteBufferFormatter
    TODO functionality of this class should be consolidated into BinaryDataFormatter class (???)
    CloverDataFormatter
    Class for saving data in Clover internal format.
    DataFormatter
    Outputs common data record.
    DelimitedDataFormatter
    Outputs delimited data record.
    FixLenDataFormatter
    Outputs fix-len data record.
    JExcelXLSDataFormatter
    Writes records to xls sheet using JExcelAPI
    StructureFormatter
    Outputs data record in form coherent with given mask.
    TextTableFormatter
    Outputs data record in form coherent with given mask.
    XLSFormatter
    Formats records for xls file.
    XLSXDataFormatter
    Represents a XLSX data formatter based on the Apache POI library.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    CloverDataFormatter.DataCompressAlgorithm  
    CloverDataFormatter.DataFormatVersion  
    CloverDataFormatter.DataIndexTableSize  
    Formatter.DataTargetType
    This enumeration is used by #getPreferredDataSourceType() method to suggest preferred data source type by a Parser.
    XLSFormatter.XLSType
    The type of a XLS(X) that should be used.
